Frequently.title: What is Node.JS development ?
Frequently.desc: Developers can quickly and easily create scalable, fast web applications using Node.js, an open-source JavaScript runtime environment. Based on an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, it is lightweight, efficient, and ideal for data-intensive real-time apps.

Frequently.title: What can Node.JS be used for ?
Frequently.desc: The most common use cases for Node JS are as follows: Apps for web and mobile devices, video conferencing apps, instant messaging, live chat, eCommerce transaction software, online gaming software, server-side applications, and chat servers

Frequently.title: Is Node.JS good for enterprise applications ?
Frequently.desc: Choosing any programming language over another will have some advantages. Node.JS, however, is a different story. A great option for enterprise application development, this web development platform offers modern tools and a forward-looking approach to developing complex apps

myList1: Development of enterprise apps using Node.Js
Pros: Model based on fast processing and events
Cons: Professionals with experience are in greater demand
